**CURRENT LIMITED TIME SPECIAL OFFER**


Coupon: **H1PVPS15** - for a limited time only (till 2016-03-31), new customers can receive 15% discount on any of our VPS plans (except Amber) when ordering with 3-12 month billing cycles.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can choose our VPS hosting from four locations: Chicago, Los Angeles (USA), Frankfurt (Germany), and Johannesburg (South Africa). Virtualization - OpenVZ.

**All our VPS packages come with:**

24/7 Support via email or tickets

14 day money-back guarantee

High-capacity, high-speed, highly redundant network

Powerful Intel Xeon CPU's

Easy to use control panel

Full root access

Centos, Ubuntu, Debian, Suse or Fedora OS

Dedicated IP address

Additional IP's - $1

cPanel license - $15/mo

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_Prices below are for Chicago, USA location._

**Bronze Plan**

1 Core

RAM: 768 MB

Disk: 60 GB HDD

Bandwidth: 1000 GB

Free Dedicated IP: 1

**Annually:** $3.69 / month – Total Price $44.24

**Semi-Annually:** $3.80 / month – Total Price $22.81

**Quarterly:** $3.92 / month – Total Price $11.76

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_Ready to order? Visit: www.host1plus.com/vps-hosting/_

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_Accepted Forms of Payment:_

PayPal, Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Boleto, Alipay, Bitcoin, Skrill, CashU, Ebanx, Paysera.
